short_description: back home restaurant is a restaurant based in elizabethtown, kentucky, united states.
long_description: write us a testimonial. we started 35 years ago with linda and tommy fulkerson selling crafts and antiques out of the trunk of their car in downtown elizabethtown. today we have expanded so much that we now are a full restaurant serving some of the best family recipes around. we have added onto the store, selling more than just crafts and antiques.
business_tags: american restaurants | restaurant hours | antiques | home decor and gifts
generated_description: back home restaurant is a family-owned business located in elizabethtown, kentucky. established in 1984, the restaurant was founded by linda and tommy fulkerson, who initially sold crafts and antiques from the trunk of their car in downtown elizabethtown. over the years, the business has expanded significantly, now offering a variety of family recipes and a full menu. today, linda and tommy's daughter lori, along with her husband steve, continue the legacy, and the restaurant operates from tuesday to saturday, 11am to 9pm, and sunday, 11am to 3pm. additionally, lori's daughter hali has opened a boutique called oneal's boutique on the upper level, which sells a range of products including home decor and gifts.
